metadata.title: CVE-2019-12106 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The updateDevice function in minissdpd.c in MiniUPnP MiniSSDPd 1.4 and 1.5 allows a remote attacker to crash the process due to a Use After Free vulnerability.

criterions.comment: minissdpd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.20190210-1').
